Control.Tooltip: Adjust Sorting Options for Main Bag.

Control.Tooltip: Adjust the size of the item icons.

Control.Name: Columns
Control.Tooltip: How many rows of items do you want?

Control.Tooltip: How many Columns of items do you want?

Control.Name: TotalSlots
Control.Tooltip: Total amount of slots including Virtual slots.

Control.Name: ResetButton
Control.Tooltip: Press this to Reset. Use this if you get Addon errors or Display Bugs in the bag slots.

Control.Name: AdjustLoot
Control.Tooltip: Adjust Loot Settings

Control.Name: AutoSellButton
Control.Tooltip: Automatically sell all "Inferior" quality items.

Control.Name: AutoRepairButton
Control.Tooltip: Automatically Repair when at the vendor.

Control.Name: ItemTrailButton
Control.Tooltip: This shows when you mouse away from an item.

Control.Name: AutoSellAmpsButton
Control.Tooltip: Automatically sell all unlearnable AMPs

Control.Name: AutoCompactButton
Control.Tooltip: When an auto Sort occurs, move all items to the top of the bags.

Control.Name: GuildRepairButton
Control.Tooltip: Try to use Guild Funds to repair first.

Control.Name: AutoOpenBags
Control.Tooltip: Automatically open bags when visiting vendors.

Control.Name: QuestItemsButton
Control.Tooltip: This bag shows all the current quest items.

Control.Name: AllowResizeBag
Control.Tooltip: Adds a scrollbar to the main bag window and allows you to scale and retain it's size.

Control.Name: OptionsTitle
Control.Tooltip: Feel free to send me any unwanted plat.

Control.Name: EnableVirtualInventory
Control.Tooltip: Disabling this prevents extra blank spots and "Extra Bags" resulting in a basic and stable bag experience.

Control.Name: AutoSortButton
Control.Tooltip: Sort items into "Extra Bags" based on their filters

Control.Name: ItemNew
Control.Tooltip: Sort items into "Extra Bags" based on their filters

Control.Name: DestroyBagButton
Control.Tooltip: Destroy bag and return all items to main bag. There is no confirmation prompt.

Control.Tooltip: Prevent any items in this bag from showing up on the Carbine Salvage list.

Control.Name: SortButton
Control.Tooltip: Sortings / Filters

Control.Name: BagFilterOptions
Control.Tooltip: Examples: junk, for junk items. You can filter multiple items into this bag using "; " For example: boost; special diet; field tech; PVP

Control.Name: Button
Control.Tooltip: This will create a filter entry for every item currently in the bag. Useful gear sets.

Control.Name: Button1
Control.Tooltip: Clear the filter.

Control.Name: Button2
Control.Tooltip: Empty bag and return them to the main bag.
